sentence: Georgia U.S. Senate candidate Herschel Walker asserted that the Democratic Party "has left Brown and Black people behind" Thursday on "Hannity."
title: Herschel Walker responds to Elie Mystal's attack: Democratic Party 'has left Brown and Black people behind'

sentence: The White House requested for Dr. Mehmet Oz and Herschel Walker to resign from the President's Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition on Wednesday, or else face termination, according to CNN.
author: Alex Nitzberg
title: White House ousts Dr. Mehmet Oz and Herschel Walker from President's Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition

sentence: Oz, best known as the host of The Dr. Oz Show, and Herschel Walker were both sent letters on Wednesday asking them to resign by the end of the day or they would be terminated, a White House official told NBC News.
author: Khaleda Rahman
title: Dr. Oz Calls Biden 'Petty' After Being Asked to Quit President's Council
